content: आज्ञा {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> To know, under stand, learn, obtain information, ascertain, notice, perceive. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (ज्ञापयति) {@--1@} To order, command, direct. {@--2@} To assure.
आज्ञा [आ-ज्ञा-अङ्] {@--1@} An order, command; तथेति शेषामिव भर्तुराज्ञां <ls>Ku. 3. 22.</ls> {@--2@} Permission, allowance.
